alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Lenoir (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Jones, south central Lenoir, northern Onslow and southern Duplin Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Penderlea, or near Wallace, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Wallace, Half Moon, Rose Hill, Richlands, Beulaville, Catherine Lake, Kellum, Cypress Creek, Comfort, Chinquapin, Potters Hill, Petersburg, Pleasant Hill, Harrells, Albert J Ellis Airport, Richlands South, Sarecta, Deppe and Greenevers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
